text_block_list.text:
From that day forward, Meisho Doto threw herself into practicing 
on her own.

Huff, huff, huff...! 
O-one more time...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Huff, wheeze, hufff...! 
I-I'm tire... No, I can't! I'm only just starting!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Taking things head-on, without giving up――
I'm going... to make it... the best race everrrrrr～～!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ――Uhyaaahhh!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ...Heh! Excellent work, Doto!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
――And at long last, the day of the meet! 
The seats were flooded with Umamusume, spectators and 
competitors alike.
Did you hear? Doto's up against Opera O in the 1800 meter, apparently! I think it was something like, "Myself and Doto, together in symphony"? Look, that's what the programme says!
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text:
A programme? Like, for a play? ......There's a lot to unpack 
there. Anyway, if Doto's the challenger... then she's totally going 
to goof up.
text_block_list.name: Classmate B

text_block_list.text:
Today, let us perform the ultimate symphony! 
I'll be counting on you, Doto!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: R-right...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Pheww... Huff....! Laces, check, bib, check, and my tummy doesn't hurt, check! I'm going to give it my best...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Who will take first in the 1800 meter? 
The Umamusume are all lined up at the gates―― and they're off!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
――Already we're coming on the third corner. Slowly but 
surely, the standout, T.M. Opera O is looking to break ahead of 
the pack.
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
(I can feel her coming up behind me...! 
She's about to go on the offensive――)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
We're finally on the home stretch! 
From the outside, it's T.M. Opera O, T.M. Opera O is pushing 
for the lead!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (There she is...!)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
The ending of this story, like my Victory Road, is already set in 
stone...!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: ――Haaaaaahhhh!!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
(S-she's getting further and further away...! 
Opera O-san really is a-amazi――)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ――Fwehh!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
What's this, Meisho Doto's lost her balance――!? 
Has she tripped!?
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (Why? Why now, too!? I really am just――)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: "Not knowing when to give up is your strength."
"Not knowing when to give up is your strength."
....Ngh.... Ra... ra... raaaaaaaaagh!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
No, she quickly regains her balance, and sets her sights on 
Opera O! 200 meters left―― Will Doto! Overtake Opera O?!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: (I'll overtake her... I'll overtake her!)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: DAAAAAAHHHHHHーー!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: They're neck and neck! T.M. Opera O! Meisho Doto! And the winner is―― T.M. Opera O!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Huff, huff... huffff! 
I knew it, I couldn't overtake her...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
(But... so many of the girls watching us are smiling... 
Maybe I'm... a little bit useful to Opera O-san now...)
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Ahh, the applause echoes in my ear! The audience gazes upon me in admiration! EXCELLENT! Thank you, one and all, thank you!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
However, I must bring attention to a person, without whom this 
show would be incomplete! Indeed, even I must acknowledge the 
power of Meisho Doto and her indominable will!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: Fwehhh!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Even my prodigious genius could not deter her! 
Give her another round of applause for putting on such a 
wonderful show!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: (Whoooooooohh!)

W-waahhh! T-thank you very much!? 
Whyyy!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Your tenacity made you more than worthy enough an opponent! 
I knew you'd be perfect, of course, but it bears repeating, I made 
the right choice casting you!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text: Then, you didn't just pick me by coincidence...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Come, now, what are you saying?! 
I'll be counting on you for the next one, Doto!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O

text_block_list.text:
As she stood still in a daze, Meisho Doto was once again 
enveloped in the spectators' applause.

That was so tense! I really thought she was going to fall over! 
Nice recovery! You go, Doto!
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text:
No Umamusume in the audience would make fun of her again. 
Unable to contain my excitement, I hurried down to meet her.

You came to watch? Thank you so much... 
It was tough, but I'm so happy I managed to give it a good run... 
Ehehe...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
You know... 
I think this race is a big step forward for me～.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She looked as if there was nothing worrying her ―― 
But I knew the truth, that her knees were covered in scrapes 
and bandages.

I knew she'd mopped up her tears time and time again. 
I knew she'd fallen and picked herself up when others could not.
Huh...!? Wh-why'd you say that all of a sudden!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
If she wants to change, then she can change, without a doubt. 
Because Meisho Doto is an Umamusume who never gives up.
choice_data_list: ――I want to see how far you can go.
――I want to see how far you can go.

text_block_list.text: ...! T-then, you mean...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: I'd like you to be my trainee.

text_block_list.text: Hwu...! Y-y-y-y-you're really okay with me!? R-re-really!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I.... I, I....! When I was running, I remembered what you told me...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
"Not knowing when to give up is your strength." 
Those words were like a little blessing to me... 
That's why... umm...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
"Not knowing when to give up is your strength." 
Those words were like a little blessing to me... 
That's why... umm...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I- I think maybe I can change, if you're by my side! 
So, basically, thank you for having me, Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: (Bump!)
Hwa!? Oh- oh no! I tripped! A-are you all right, Trainer-saaaaan!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
